canvas-set-1.title: Maya - Optimized Living Enthusiast
canvas-set-1.description: I love Redmond Living products because I know they're made with nourishing, responsibly sourced ingredients that feel good on and in my body, helping me live my best life.

canvas-set-1.title: Cedar - Peak Performer
canvas-set-1.description: Re-Lyte products help me perform at my best! I also love Redmond's natural seasonings and care products, so I know what I'm putting on or in my body.

canvas-set-1.title: Caleb - Conscious Caretaker
canvas-set-1.description: My kids love Relyte, and so do I! Redmond products help us stay hydrated and healthy, allowing us to feel our best and spend quality time together.

canvas-set-1.title: Chef Shawna - Master of the Meal
canvas-set-1.description: Redmond's Real Salt and seasonings are unparalleled! I love these products, whether I'm preparing a quick meal for myself or an elaborate twelve-course meal for a dinner party.

canvas-set-1.title: Silas - Steward of the Land
canvas-set-1.description: Re-Lyte keeps me hydrated as I work in the field, and I love Real Salt and seasonings on the eggs, meat, and vegetables I raise!
